Stefano_package.components

Class CadComponent3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stefano_package.components.CadComponent
      • Stefano_package.components.CadComponent3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICadComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CadCylinder, CadParallelepiped

    public abstract class CadComponent3D
extends CadComponent
    This class is the abstract base class for 3D Stefano_package.components. It extends the CadComponent class adding the z coordinate, overloading the setPosition method and providing a prototype to project the 3D figure onto a 2D plane
    Author:
    Stefano Demarchi
